Seongsu Park. (2024, November 4). From Pyongyang to Your Payroll: The Rise of North Korean Remote Workers in the West. Retrieved October 17, 2025.

objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has leveraged Telegram chat to upload stolen data using the Telegram API with a bot token.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: Zscaler ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)
